name: calculate_comprehensive_biorhythms
description: Calculates a comprehensive set of biorhythms based on the provided date and birth information, including season, moon phase, (placeholder) sun cycle phase, and circadian tendency.

date.description: The current date for which to calculate biorhythms, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

birth_date.description: The birth date of the individual, used for calculating biorhythms, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

birth_time.description: The time of birth, used to determine circadian tendencies, formatted in 'HH:MM' format.
